---
title: "🗓️ Week 08 - Handling geospatial data with **R**"
---

In this week, we will handle **geospatial data** using R. 


## 👨‍🏫 Lecture Slides 

We'll learn how to use  R libraries to read, query and visualize geospatial data. In particular, we will focus on [*simple features for R*](https://r-spatial.github.io/sf/articles/sf1.html)


## **Practical exercises**:

Students complete a geospatial notebook using the EVA dataset:

::: {.callout-note collapse="true"}
[Thematic maps in R](https://rpubs.com/ials2un/thematic_maps_v2)
:::
